Package RautSoft.math.functions

This class contains methods to create various orthogonal polynomials such as Hermite, Laguerre, Legendre, Chebyshev and also to calculate Chebyshev zeroes.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
Orthopoly Polynomials - Orthogonal, Legendre
 

Package RautSoft.math.functions Description

This class contains methods to create various orthogonal polynomials such as Hermite, Laguerre, Legendre, Chebyshev and also to calculate Chebyshev zeroes.

Usage example

import static RautSoft.math.functions.Orthopoly.*;

public class OrthopolyEx {
    
    public static void main(String[] args) {
           
        
        
        System.out.println("Chebyshev Polynomials T(0,10.5)  = " + T(0,10.5));
        System.out.println("Chebyshev Polynomials T(1,10.5)  = " + T(1,10.5));
        System.out.println("Chebyshev Polynomials T(25,10.5) = " + T(25,10.5));
        
        System.out.println("Hermite Polynomials H(0,10.5)  = " + H(0,10.5));
        System.out.println("Hermite Polynomials H(1,10.5)  = " + H(1,10.5));
        System.out.println("Hermite Polynomials H(25,10.5) = " + H(25,10.5));
        
        
        System.out.println("Laguerre Polynomials L(0,10.5)  = " + L(0,10.5));
        System.out.println("Laguerre Polynomials L(1,10.5)  = " + L(1,10.5));
        System.out.println("Laguerre Polynomials L(25,10.5) = " + L(25,10.5));
        
        
        System.out.println("Legendre Polynomials P(0,10.5)  = " + P(0,10.5));
        System.out.println("Legendre Polynomials P(1,10.5)  = " + P(1,10.5));
        System.out.println("Legendre Polynomials P(25,10.5) = " + P(25,10.5));
        int n1=10;
        System.out.println("The chevyshev zeroes: for n1 = 10, ChebyshevZeros(i, n1,10,100), for i=1, ..n1");
        for (int i=1;i≤ n1;i++){
            
            System.out.println("\t" + ChebyshevZeros(i, n1,10,100)  ) ;
        }
    }
}

Output of the above code


Chebyshev Polynomials T(0,10.5)  = 1.0
Chebyshev Polynomials T(1,10.5)  = 10.5
Chebyshev Polynomials T(25,10.5) = 5.367206916700416E32
Hermite Polynomials H(0,10.5)  = 1.0
Hermite Polynomials H(1,10.5)  = 21.0
Hermite Polynomials H(25,10.5) = 2.4403342509694203E32
Laguerre Polynomials L(0,10.5)  = 1.0
Laguerre Polynomials L(1,10.5)  = -9.5
Laguerre Polynomials L(25,10.5) = 27.276492781562244
Legendre Polynomials P(0,10.5)  = 1.0
Legendre Polynomials P(1,10.5)  = 10.5
Legendre Polynomials P(25,10.5) = 1.2757515361683638E32
The chevyshev zeroes: for n1 = 10, ChebyshevZeros(i, n1,10,100), for i=1, ..n1
    10.5540246732188
    14.904706411523446
    23.18019484660536
    34.570427511720396
    47.96044907318961
    62.03955092681037
    75.4295724882796
    86.81980515339464
    95.09529358847655
    99.4459753267812
